name: Dreams of you,
description:
Dreams of You, is a Yume Nikki Inspired fangame that I created for a college project.

The prototype is roughly 3-5 minutes long and explores the intro-area to what would be the full game.

Story:

In this game you play as a young girl who decides to try out some experimental technology that allows a person to enter the dreams of someone close to them.

The young girl named Sophea decides to use this technology to enter the dreams of her friend who has been in a coma for 4 years now to try and wake them up.

As you explore the dreams you’ll see some weird and strange environments and creatures with some environments being peaceful places and others out to harm you.

Controls:
Left & Right arrow keys to move.
Up Arrow Key to Jump
E to Interact
Space to Skip Dialogue
L to leave Dialogue and Leave Game

Credits:
All Art & Code was done by myself (Arron aka https://twitter.com/Mostly_RC)
Menu Music - Frolic by E's Jammy Jams
World Music - Night Run Away by An Jone

I hope you enjoy! =)
